root.name: beginDraw()

example.code: size(100, 100, P2D) pg = createGraphics(80, 80, P2D) pg.beginDraw() pg.background(102) pg.stroke(255) pg.line(20, 20, 80, 80) pg.endDraw() image(pg, 10, 10)

root.description: Sets the default properties for a PGraphics object. It should be called before anything is drawn into the object.

parameter.label: graphics
parameter.description: PGraphics: any object of the type PGraphics
